name: Death Museum Checklist
description:
My second ever game, created for the Gentle Ghost Jam.

W,A,S,D to move. 

Locate the 6 exhibits to learn more about who you are. When you're finished head through the portal. Your soul strength is dwindling constantly so be sure to replenish your energy at the Soul Shard Crystal Shard.

Where is Sandra, by the way?
